name: coderboost-frontend
description: Frontend for CoderBoost - A programming learning platform

scripts.build: vite build && npm run copy-views && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-views: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); if (!fs.existsSync('dist/views')) fs.mkdirSync('dist/views', { recursive: true }); const viewsDir = 'views'; const distViewsDir = 'dist/views'; fs.readdirSync(viewsDir).forEach(file => { const sourcePath = path.join(viewsDir, file); const destPath = path.join(distViewsDir, file); if (fs.statSync(sourcePath).isDirectory()) { if (!fs.existsSync(destPath)) fs.mkdirSync(destPath, { recursive: true }); } fs.copyFileSync(sourcePath, destPath); }); console.log('Views copied successfully');"
scripts.copy-assets: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); if (!fs.existsSync('dist/assets/images')) fs.mkdirSync('dist/assets/images', { recursive: true }); const assetsDir = 'assets/images'; const distAssetsDir = 'dist/assets/images'; fs.readdirSync(assetsDir).forEach(file => { const sourcePath = path.join(assetsDir, file); const destPath = path.join(distAssetsDir, file); fs.copyFileSync(sourcePath, destPath); }); console.log('Assets copied successfully');"
